name: Eligible investments; scope
text:
§431:6-103    (a)  This article shall apply to domestic insurers only.  Insurers shall invest in or loan their funds on the security of, and shall hold as assets, only eligible investments as prescribed in this article.
	(b)  The eligibility of an investment shall be determined as of the date of its making or acquisition.
	(c)  Any limitation based upon the amount of the insurer's assets shall relate to assets as shown by the insurer's annual statement as of December 31 preceding date of investment. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
